      • detectCards

        public java.util.List<Card> detectCards​(org.opencv.core.Mat frame,
                                        int threshold)
        Method for detecting and returning cards in an image
        Parameters:
        frame - openCV representation of an image
        threshold - an integer representing the threshold for making the image black and white.
        Returns:
        A list of card objects

      • identifyCard

        public void identifyCard​(org.opencv.core.Mat frame,
                         Card card)
        Adds number/value and suit to a card
        Parameters:
        frame - openCV representation of an image
        card - a card object. Often from the 'detectCards' method.
